column2: # Use base model predictions as features in a meta logistic regression model
stack_data     <- data.frame(p1 = p1, p2 = p2, p3 = p3, epidemic = factor(df_predictors$epidemic))
meta_model     <- glm(epidemic ~ p1 + p2 + p3, data = stack_data, family = binomial)
glm(formula = epidemic ~ p1 + p2 + p3, family = binomial, data = stack_data)
